comments.author: Maria Bramo (Riaria)

comments.text:
I wish it was that easy. Everything for my crush and I is in place. But the 
one thing, is that he doesn't talk to me. Trust me when I say he's a huge 
talker, he's always yelling and is very loud, he's very talkative and easy 
to start a conversation with, though whenever I talk to him, he doesn't 
make eye contact, he always kinda looks away. His voice gets much more 
softer, and a little quieter than usual, like he's being gentle. Also my 
friends have spotted it as well. He apparently does start to blush, but I 
don't see it. My best friend in class has told me that when he talks to 
anyone else or even herself, he's completely normal. Though when one time 
we both had to ask him something about a group project, my friend asked if 
he had finished it, he talked completely normal. Though when I asked him 
and told him about something to add and when he would be finished, she 
apparently heard him become more quiet and not even look in my direction. 
Everyone says he's just shy or nervous, but I don't believe it because he's 
a really confident guy. It comes off as if he's rejecting me, which hurts. 
Because he'll give short answers or even dismissive ones, as if he just 
wants the conversation to end or not even start one. 

Is he nervous and or shy, or is he actually rejecting me?﻿

although it was just an paragraph intront of a few girls and boys she was

much smarter than me at everything and I don't want to seem dumb to her
